alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 5:12PM AKST until January 16 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow with low visibility. East winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Over Dalton Highway Summits of the Upper Koyukuk Valley. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst conditions will be over Dalton Highway Summits such as Finger Mountain. Conditions will not be as severe in valleys. Winds are expected to decrease slightly late Sunday night, although drifting snow will continue into Monday.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
